FuncPrototypeÂ¶

struct asmjit::FuncPrototype
#include <func.h>

Function prototype.

Function prototype contains information about function return type, count of arguments and their types. Function prototype is a low level structure which doesn’t contain platform specific or calling convention specific information. Function prototype is used to create a FuncDecl.

Public Functions

uint32_t getRet()

Get function return value.

const uint32_t * getArgList()

Get function arguments’ IDs.

uint32_t getArgCount()

Get count of function arguments.

uint32_t getArg(uint32_t id)

Get argument at index id.

void _setPrototype(uint32_t ret, const uint32_t * argList, uint32_t argCount)

Set function definition - return type and arguments.

Public Members

uint32_t _ret

uint32_t _argCount

const uint32_t * _argList
